website_summaries.verdict: Gently glides and trains dogs into heel position, providing barrier between dog and bike.
pros: If dog stops to potty suddenly, you won't be knocked over on the bike
Built well and stays in place
Leash is light and easy to peddle around with
Lets dog instantly propel bike as paw and pedal hybrid bike all in one
cons: Bolts may wear out and leash could break in half with extended use
Only works on left side of bike and interferes with chain in some instances

customer_reviews.title: This BTL worked wonderfully right out of the shoot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lovely item toward the end of winter. It has been used enough now that I can give an honest review. My dog---a 3 yrs old all muscle pit bull mix--she is one strong girl. This BTL worked wonderfully right out of the shoot, I did have my reservations, turned out they were unfounded. This past week said muscle dog and I went camping, this BTL did it's job even with all the chipmunks and wild turkeys running right in front of muscle dog. Hardly even felt a tug when she would attempt to lunge at the critters. Would I recommend this Bike Tow Leash??? You Betch Ya--!!!
customer_reviews.author: hsms

customer_reviews.title: you have to buy the other product by the same name in order to use this, they didn't make that clear
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand that I had to buy the other product, your description should have made that clear. I did look all over both items trying to see how it worked. When they both have the same name and the pictures aren't clear a first time buyer like me may not understand. I lost the time I could have been using something else along with having to package this back up and mail it back plus having to watch my account to make sure my money was refunded. All this does not make me want to have any more to do with this company. Their product seems good but definately not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: marti fleming

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product to use to exercise and keep your dog safe while bike riding. I’ve used this personally with all of my Labradoodles and with my clients. I am a dog trainer & behaviorist. This is extremely useful with results for high energy dogs. Let’s them do something fun with you while depleting their energy. Also helps people with not a lot of time to exercise their dogs several times a day. My dogs,3 of them, can’t wait to go when they see me get the bike out. They recognize the tow bar! If you can bike ride and have a dog, you can easily use this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Morris

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like, this tow leash works so well you don't even notice that it's there. I have a 120 lb dog that tried to chase a squirrel and we we runnung/riding as fast as we could, my dog tried to go afterthe squirrel. I barely felt him pulling on the bike. I am so very happy that I got the tow leash, I have all confidence in it and am not afraid to go anywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Sue  Henson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash
customer_reviews.text: What a great leash. I use this with a ruff wear harness to exercise my Aussie. I'm not comfortable putting pressure on my dog's neck for pulling activities. It is a hair too long to be truly safe with a harness (he could touch the front wheel if he really, really tried) but practicing direction and speed cues walking alongside the bike until he was reliable worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: deskjockey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: As we get older and more decrepit, it's been harder to keep our beagles happy while going for walks. They crave exercise and we just can't keep up. We hooked this on one of our bicycles and the dogs took to it right away. We've been careful to not go too fast, and to watch for tiredness. They've done fine coupled together with a regular dog coupler.
customer_reviews.author: hate housework

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts, but this thing is AMAZING!!! I have 2 crazy dogs that need lots of running and who are also not trained well at all. They go nuts over any dog or human they see and one has severe anxiety because of a previous owner's abuse. This has saved all of our lives!!! It works so well for both of them and they just run and run next to my bike. They have tried to run after other people and their dogs and it has been easy to keep them in line every time. I'm still soooo happy and amazed at how well this thing works!!!! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Very safe & fun.
customer_reviews.text: An awesome product. I have probably sold this product 100x based on the reactions of others when they see me coming with Granger by my side! You can use the hashtag 'biketowleash' on IG or look up my IG account @beachbrights to view photos. Granger once lunged for a squirrel while we were riding and I was able to maintain control of the bike & barely feel the "pull". Now, I am only leisurely biking (beach cruiser) but I spent the summer cruising the streets of Rosemary Beach, FL with my Bike Tow Leash and WE had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBrights

customer_reviews.title: Good for long-distance SPRINTERS, but totally incompatible with disk brakes.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing. Most of the dog jogger bikes mounts are comparable if you're just looking to have a dog jog easily alongside the bike. IF, however, you have a long-distance sprinter that will try to pull you like a one-dog sled team, THIS is the superior product. I used this with my dog, and I have her wear a dog sled harness, which I also recommend, if your dog will be pulling you, that way they don't injure themselves or get bald/sore spots. But I recently upgraded my bike, and it has disk brakes, and this product can no longer work for my dog and I, due to it not being compatible with disk brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Diagon Allie

customer_reviews.title: Yay exercise!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this! I’ve got a 63 lb staffweiler that loves exploring and meeting people and she just loves everybody, and this is an excellent way to get her to just please calm down for a moment. I do have it attached to the right side of my bike. It just barely fits between the frame and the gears, but I’d rather have her by the sidewalk than by the cars. She prefers it that way too. The only reason this has 4 instead of 5 stars is that it isn’t made to go on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo C

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INVESTMENT FOR HIGH ENERGY PETS
customer_reviews.text: Best investment EVER!. My high energy Staffy loves it. I even made a video to prove it. Just another took to keep her exercised and in great health and shape.
customer_reviews.author: omar torres

customer_reviews.title: Good for strong dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very strong Belgian Malinois/Shephard mix and this item has been perfect for us. When she does pull the arm keeps a strong safe hold without pulling on the bike. Highly recommend. Only downside is that it only fits on the left side of bike so I will be getting the attachment for right side soon.
customer_reviews.author: JDough

customer_reviews.title: The best dog product we've bought for our pup!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Labradoodle, lots of energy. This product was suggested by our neighbors. Our dog loves it! He can't wait to go for runs everyday. We've had it for several months, going on bike rides 5 times a week and haven't had any issues with our dogs safety, or the durability of the product. I highly recommend this product to anyone with an energetic/athletic pup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike tow leash for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike tow leash! We had one for 3 years on our bike, which was stolen. We replaced the the bike and got this tow leash again. It is flexible, easy to mount, durable, convenient and functions perfectly. People always ask about it when we take our 16 pound Bichon Frise/Miniature Poodle dog running alongside while we are bike riding and are impressed with it and our small athletic energetic dog. Best product of its kind out there! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cookiemb

customer_reviews.title: Great bike tow for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the dog walkie and the it worked fine. However, my dogs would hit their heads on the medal pole that sticks straight out. It also let my large dogs pull me off balance which is not good. This bike tow has none of those problems! The dogs are free to move and there's little chance if them knocking me over. I would recommend buying the extra piece that allows you to put the tow on the right side of the bike. It will keep your dog out of traffic. The only reason why I gave this 4 stars was because of the price. It's high for the material involved.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: You can't put a price on safety
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. I've had mine for about 5 years and it is still going strong. Best on the market and worth the money. I tried to convince my husband to get this one from the start but he insisted on trying a couple of others first. Waste of time and money. I highly recommend this bike tow leash, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky S

customer_reviews.title: Works great but far too pricey for what it is
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers have stated, this product is great as it is really easy to attach to your bike frame but for what is essentially a clamp with a bendy pole, $150 is crazy steep. Maybe if it was like $80 could I say it would truly be worth it. Also, it is not right side friendly without modifications.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 70+ lb yellow lab. He LOVES it, and despite the fact he is a bit of a spaz and will try to go after a squirrel or rabbit on some trails, he cannot pull me off course, which I worried about with other leashes that attach higher on the bike. We will be using this on a regular basis. It IS kinda pricey, but it's worth it so far. Will have to see about durability as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Doan

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Recently got a 1 year old rescue with a ton of energy. Taking him on normal walks was not cutting it, the Bike Tow leash is a fantastic invention. I have this hooked up to a 24" bmx cruiser and I can run him fast for a couple miles. The design keeps the dog from coming anywhere near the wheels. This product got me and my dog off the couch and we are both happier as a result. This is a home run
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife on Christmas along with her first bike. She loves it and the dog loves it too. It was a little bit of a pain to set up on my wife's new bike because of the way the frame is made and because of her disc brakes, but after about 15 minutes of cursing bike tow leash, I figured it out and my wife hasn't taken it off since. It does require some tightening before every ride, but that might be because of how I had to place it. Everyone who walks their dogs in the neighborhood get a kick out of it and ask where we got it. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: B_S_H1127

customer_reviews.title: This is the best! I was worried my dog would pull me ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! I was worried my dog would pull me off my bike, but attached to the back wheel area this isn’t an option. It’s easy to install (turn the bike upside down to make it even easier). I give it four starts because my dog can still run into my tire if I turn too quickly. She’s never been hurt, but I wish there was a way to lock her at least a few inches away!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit my bike, otherwise great concept.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this on a bike we use at our rescue, so I purchased one for myself. Finally break down and buy one and find out that it will not fit my bike as I have disc breaks on my mountain bike. Is there another attachment or way for this to work universally? Would love feedback before sending back. **Update** I found that there is an attachment you can purchase to fit my bike that has disc brakes, on their website.
customer_reviews.author: jackie ormond

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! We have had many bike rides and ...
customer_reviews.text: I always road my bike with my 12 pound jack russell by just holding the leash. But my now 25 pound rescue was too much to handle when she spotted a squirrel or deer. Researched and found this product, LOVE IT! We have had many bike rides and as others have stated i don't even feel through the bike when she tries to veer off toward a squirrel! Was so nervous at first but we can just speed along now! It was very, very easy to attach to my old schwinn 18 gear bike. Too bad winter is coming on now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Browser

customer_reviews.title: Greatest invention for exercising a dog!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the Bike tow Leash!!! I have 3 dogs. When I would take them walking, one in particular pulls like there his a steak waiting for him. I tried several of the no pull harnesses and collars to no avail and he was killing my back. When I saw this and the high ratings I decided it was worth a try. I am so glad I did. This is fantastic and worth every cent!! Now he can run while I'm on my bike. I just can't say enough good things about it, love it, Love it, LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Accessory for Taking Dog Cycling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the BTL after a lot of research to take my dog with me when I ride my recumbent trike. The BTL is fantastic and Mike Leon is excellent to work with. Holds securely to my trike in a variety of locations. Keeps my dog at a safe distance from wheels and keeps her secured to her harness. Can be mounted on left or right side of trike and on a variety of bikes and even wheel chairs. Well worth it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: James Barker

customer_reviews.title: I call Bingo!
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive, but it is SO worth it. I use it with my one year old Husky and she pulls me along like a champ. We go for long and short rides as time permits, but she has not caused an accident in spite of various impediments along the way, including other dogs. It looks weird and is a little bit of a pain to remove, but still within reason and the utility clearly outweighs the little nit picks. If you are looking for a good way to go biking with your dog, this is the safest, most fun and clearly well thought out solution. Money well spent. Good customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a great black lab who has loads of energy, listens really well, but has a strong prey drive so is not ready for off leash....YET. I wanted to ride with her so I thought I'd try this. It has been amazing. She caught on very quickly, ran beside the bike perfectly. We eventually did see some animals and the bike leash did not allow her to get far away along with my firm "NO" command. I felt very steady on my bike even when she tried to move away. Should be a strong trail rider to use this. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen Steinbrunner

customer_reviews.title: Stable rides even with very athletic dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 80 lb treeing walker coonhound that used to run with me until I had an injury. I started training him with my bike so he would get exercise but it was always a little unstable; he's a powerful dog. The Btl has been a lifesaver and we just love it. I use his pinch collar and leash at the same time and that's also because we stop for short breaks on long rides. I'll unhook the btl and walk a bit. The btl is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: The bike attachment is easily adjusted to the correct height and angle. It mounts securely with the included bracket. My dog quickly gained confidence. He responds to changes in direction and speed with ease. I have stability and control over our ride and am confident in the durability. The product does not rub against any part of the bike frame or tire when installed and adjusted correctly and you have control of your dog. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar P.

customer_reviews.title: ... that work so well that you can't help being glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Yet one overpriced dog item that work so well that you can't help being glad I bought it. Everyone oohs an ahhs at the dog park as my 50lb hound dog gleefully pulls me around the paved path at our local park. It is amazing how little impact is felt when Ellie the dog wants to investigate some passing dog or odor.. Would buy again in a heartbeat...
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: Best item you'll buy for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: I am stopped every time I take my dog out by people asking where they can buy this. And I always tell them that of all the things I've purchased for my dog, this is by far the best! So easy to attach, the hardest part was convincing my dog that this was not a strange instrument of torture! We started off slow but she quickly picked up the hang of it. Now when I let her off the lead, she will run along side me and race!
customer_reviews.author: A. Elliss

customer_reviews.title: Just received it, hooked up to the bike right ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it, hooked up to the bike right away and took pup for a ride. He LOVES it and loves going fast. Doesn't take long for the dog to figure it out and adjust, can't feel the dog pull/jerk or any of that. It is fixed and rigid so he can never dart toward the bike. It is exactly what I needed and I'm thrilled to have a third option for excercising with my dog! Pricey but well made and worth every penny, see it holding up and lasting a long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Exerciser
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing training tool. I have a large golden retriever, and the bike tow leash is solid enough that he is held securely but can still stay clear of any moving bicycle parts. If your dog is trained to walk on a leash, it is super easy to transition to this leash for bicycling. I also use a martingale collar as recommended for neck comfort and security. Besides the great exercise we both can get together, we get a lot of happy onlookers who point and wave at the beautiful sight.
customer_reviews.author: Tagger

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but awesome. So many people comment on it. Be careful though as you can easily over work your dog. Take small steps and bike slow until your dog is in good health. The design is amazing. I wish it worked on the right side of the bike. I understand why it can't on most bikes.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: With no tools required, this device attaches securely to my bike in about 45 seconds. It takes half that to remove it. It keeps my dog perfectly in the heel position and gently guides her through turns, stops, etc. I no longer worry about her pulling suddenly while we're moving or getting caught in or interfering with my rear wheel (she never did, but it was a constant concern for me - now it's impossible!) Interestingly, my dog seems to enjoy going for a ride/run a lot more now than when I was one-handing it with a leash. In short: this thing was worth every penny and I wish I'd gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burchard

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this leash
customer_reviews.text: I use the Bike tow leash on my Dahon Speed D7 20" folding bike for my 16 lb. Schnoodle. Initially, she was trotting along side me as I held on to her leash while riding. Well, until the day she tried to cross in front of me and almost caused a major accident. I began researching a number of leashes and decided on this Bike Tow Leash. There are a number of u tube videos that help with this decision. I attach it to her 1 inch collar which gives me better control of the ride and she just doesn't want to stop. She loves it. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: My very energetic rescue dog finally gets the exercise she needs
customer_reviews.text: The leash is a great concept. It works very well and my dog loves going for bike rides. Holding the leash while trying to bike around the neighborhood is a disaster waiting to happen. She is fast like a greyhound and she pulls but with the new bike leash, it's a fun and relaxing exercise for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: the BTW is so much better. I have one 90 lb
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Walky Dog first and used it for a week then I received my Bike Tow Leash. There is NO comparison, the BTW is so much better. I have one 90 lb. German Shepherds and a 100 lb. one, when I used the Walky dog product they would be pulling me and jerking my bike. NOW with the Bike Tow Leash I hardly feel them at all and the dogs stay farther away from the bike tires. The price is higher but the difference is well worth it. Thank you for such a great and FUN product. My dogs love it and they get the exercise they deserve!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Drajin

customer_reviews.title: High Energy Dogs-Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about this years ago. Easy to install. No need to training. I have a Husky that is extremely energetic. One piece of advice, don't try to make your dog a "weekend warrior". If your dog isn't use to this, get the dog "boots" for long distance.
customer_reviews.author: KedwinD

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for biking with our pup
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Great investment for biking with our pup. Works so well, however, that pup tires fast and attempts to sit down/lay down when the bike is slowed. For this reason, we have not gotten to enjoy long bike rides with him yet, but we hope more time and cooler but still nice bike-riding weather will afford more opportunity for him to grow to like longer rides. Brilliant design and gives us complete peace of mind for both pup and bike rider.
customer_reviews.author: dollarmom

customer_reviews.title: Exercises an energtic dog wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: So far amazing! 13lb dog even went for squirrels without toppling me. Let's see how long it lasts compared to other reviews. For now it lives up to description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog that likes to run, this is great. I researched a lot before I bought this. I have a 90lb labradoodle that needs the exercise. It was easy to hook on the bike. Holds him securely and even when he tries to go opposite it doesn't throw me off the bike. I barely feel it.I have gotten a lot of comments from people who think its great! Abel my dog loves it. He gets to run!
customer_reviews.author: zoominnana

customer_reviews.title: Jane C.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So does Bruno. Bruno is deaf, so I thought I'd have issues with giving guidence or corrections. Not a problem! The Bike Tow Leash is flexable but rigid enough to give gentle direction to your puppy. I am not a confident bike rider, so I was a little nervous about having a 65 pound (and still growing) puppy tied to my bike. Even if he gets spooked on our rides, I only feel a little tug. Great design. Exceptional quality. You will get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Miami Bombera

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Doberman. He is reactive to other dogs while on leash so that makes him difficult to walk. The Bike Tow Leash enables us to run the city streets at an average speed of 14.5mph. He does not even look at other dogs while running and gets plenty of exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Turi

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Allows enough freedom for the dog, yet keeps rider on bicycle stable. I leave mine connected all the time, even without the dog, because it can be brought upward for solo riding. The connect knobs are quick, but I am too lazy, so I just leave it on all the time. The best such product out there, in quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: husky excercises., you, not so much
customer_reviews.text: awesome..just make sure it is tightened REALLY well. Let the gorilla handed husband do it. Despite all the lose dogs in my neighborhood (all 5 acre lots and bigger) and my panic with dogs keepin with us and trying to wrestle mine, we have not had any accidents. Hurricane sometimes went behind bike but never rubbed tire or anything bad.However as my 7 month old husky is so very strong, I really do nee to get the back brake fixed. i have to use the front brake full force , while sayin easy, while putting a foot down flinstone style. lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it. Easy to install. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this thing is absolutely amazing. It was freakishly easy to attach to my bike’s rear wheel. I have a 100 pound dog and was worried about how hard he would pull. No worries, this leash is almost like he is not there. Biggest win is he goes crazy when he sees the leash. He loves his runs.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchpoppy

customer_reviews.title: My first dog loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased. My first dog loved it so much, that I had to buy one for the second dog. After reading many different reviews out there, I decided that this was the safest one and that my dogs would be able to stay on the leash and not knock me over. Very happy with this purchase. Easy to install and remove. Dogs love it. I'd never try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Can't imagine biking a dog without this. Got my dog used to it very quickly. She doesn't pull the bike over, or run under the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Cazier

customer_reviews.title: great exerciser
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a safe way to ride my bike with two dogs. I can hang on to one dog, but two was not safe as they could pull me over. I have a seven year old dog that is used to biking, but the 11 month pup, had never gone by the side of a moving bike. I put the bike leash on the pups harness, held the other dogs leash and took off. Wow, no problems, just like it says, dog is not able to get around front or back tire and can not pull sideways enough to pull me over. Pup loved it, no fear at all. Both dogs are Cattle Dogs. Highly recommend the Bike Tow Leash.
customer_reviews.author: S. Henson

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful!! I have been using it for quite ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful!! I have been using it for quite awhile and it keeps both of us safe. On the few occasions when I've parked my bike and she's tried to walk off the bike has tipped but never fallen on her. I feel much safer with this, because she cannot pull me out into the street. Since my dog loves to run and I don't this is a great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought this a year ago
customer_reviews.text: This is leash is outstanding! I have 2 large dogs (lab mixes of 50-65 lbs) that went from a home on 2 acres to living in Singapore with no open space. I have two bad knees so running them was not an option. This leash allows me to let them trot and be out for longer periods of time. They LOVE it and it tires them out. One is a dream to walk and the other chases everything. The leash keeps them under control and the bike stays stable at all times. It is worth every penny! The construction is good and the design is amazing. I highly recommend this for large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond T.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The BTL is fabulous. I got it for my mother to use on her mobility scooter for walking her dog. This is the perfect solution. The directions provided to adjust its angle for the height of the dog were adequate, I did need to buy longer bolts to make the bracket fit around the seat post, but all in all, I highly recommend this for use with a mobility scooter. Her dog adapted to being hooked to it and walking with it within one minute.
customer_reviews.author: TSmith

customer_reviews.title: And I LOVE IT. MY DOG LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: I have a 75 lbs husky that has brought me down every time we bikejore. So I was very hesitant about buying the BTL. But after researching and reading reviews I had to try it. And I LOVE IT. MY DOG LOVES IT! You are in control, not your dog. 4 stars because of its price only.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Dog Leash!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has tried several different kinds of dog leash attachments with her husky, but this one is the clear winner. It’s flexible enough to allow him room to stay out of the bike’s way and make adjustments to his path beside her as needed. It’s also sturdy and doesn’t slip out of place. She does use an additional leash as a safety precaution, but has never needed it. They have ridden/run many miles together and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm finally able to give my Standard Poodle the exercise she needs. We started out slow as recommended and within a week we were going about a mile. After a month we are up to 2 1/2 miles. There are a lot of people and dogs on the bike trails in Anchorage, I can feel a slight pull when my dog gets distracted, but it is not enough to cause me any concern. My dog is much happier and healthier. She begs me to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This bike leash is extremely well designed and works with minimal training. My dog loves it a lot and he gets all excited when I put my helmet on. It is a very good quality product, my dog even stay focus when we see deers and bunnies. I like the safety aspect as risks for my dog to get injured by a pedal or a wheel is minimal. Cannot wait to use it this winter in the snow. Just wish it would be a little more affordable. It was hard for me to get it in Canada. People in my area have never seen anything like this before -- it does generates a lot of excitement!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lacasse

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Was only going to test out with each dog. They got the hang of it immediately. We did three miles all dog pace powered. So far LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: and nothing bad happened beyond a slight tugging sensation
customer_reviews.text: This bike-leash attachment is so worth the money-- I feel so safe biking with my dog and it has been tested. Eg the other day 2 squirrels sat in the road in front of my bike while my 50lb dog was attached. He went absolutely ape, and nothing bad happened beyond a slight tugging sensation. AMAZING!!! Also it was very VERY easy to install (no tools necessary for me because my dog's height was perfect for the model as-is). Thanks so much for making such a great product! You have given me a whole new safe way to have fun with my pup! <3
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: careful with a strong dog
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install. My dog is a fast and strong 75 lbs. More than half my weight. I put it on my heavist bike. If she sees a squirrel I am in control.
customer_reviews.author: maria maroney

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases we have ever made
customer_reviews.text: We thought about the purchase for a while, but were thrown by the price. One of the best purchases we have ever made. The dogs get great exercise and worth every penny. Very strudy with our 100+ lb pit. We use it with a leash for more control. We have a hook to keep tow up when not in use. Gave it as a Christmas gift and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kris  anderson

customer_reviews.title: A MUST if you plan to exercise your dog with bike rides!!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 accidents caused by trying to take my Lab/Husky mix on bike rides by holding her leash, I decided we needed to find another way before a serious injury occurred. I can't tell you how many people I would pass along our ride that told me "I used to do that!!". What a incredibly stressful ride and accident waiting to happen! I LOVE this bike tow leash! I can't say enough good things about how it has turned our rides and her exercise time into a safe and enjoyable routine for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest, best working thing I have ever bought on Amazon. Works amazing. High quality, designed with high attention to detail. Everyone stops and asks me about it. I tell them its worth the money. Just buy it. You'll be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Miles2623

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit w/Disc Brakes. Adapter is another $38.00!
customer_reviews.text: Would not work with disc brakes. If they think I'm going to order a $38 adapter to make this $150 product work they are out of their minds.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for my reactive high energy dog!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lifesaver! I have a reactive, high energy Doberman and this product has made exercising her fun, safe and fast! Wonderful product for anyone looking to bike with their dog. It keep you in control of bike and the dog a comfortable distance without being so restrictive that the dog can learn how to walk/run on it quickly. It’s also incredibly easy to put on and off the bike, about a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Tameaka H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I was worried when I ordered as I have two very energetic, very strong pit bulls and I am not the worlds best cyclist! It works really well and is very stable, I haven't had any issues or felt in danger of falling off even when the dogs pull away. Both dogs got the idea really quickly, I just walked the bike to start with and then went on a short ride.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Dog is a puller but bike rider has ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Dog is a puller but bike rider has control. Dog can pull the bike in the direction the rider wants to go. Only problem was in installation. It doesn't mount the same way on all bikes. Had to sift through the instructions to find a method that works. If it doesn't fit your bike, you have to pay for accessories without being sure they'll work.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The Springer is a much better design than this product, which will allow the dog to pass behind the bike and to the other side if it really wants to, dragging the arm across the rear tire.
customer_reviews.author: Erika N. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: We have use this only about 6 time so far due to snow and freezing weather. I bought it for my Jack Russell. He seems to be enjoying it. It seems to be much safer than the first bike leash I bought. I have been taking it slow with introducing him to it. It is more flexible than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Parent

customer_reviews.title: No Fear of Falling!
customer_reviews.text: I used to hold my dog's leash in my hand while I cycled. After taking a particularly bad fall, I researched various attachments for my bicycle. The Bike Tow Leash impressed me. I've been using it for several weeks, and have no regrets! Star is a 60-pound pointer/hound mix, and she adapted well to the Bike Tow Leash. When Star gets distracted and wants to pull away, I feel a slight pull on the back tire. A quick, "Here," brings her back to my side. I feel safe and confident while cycling with my dog. I am VERY pleased with this product. Several neighbors have stopped me to ask about the Bike Tow Leash. The product almost sells itself.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie2030

customer_reviews.title: great product. more expensive but worth it for a safe fun ride.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this leash. We used a walky dog prior to purchasing due to cost....however my dog pulls too much and the wd sits high so sometimes the bike would be off balance. This sits low and has way more control. I can pedal faster and get my shepherd focused and to move on. I had to transition from the right side to the left...which is working. It says you can mount on the left however my bike has limited room with the gears so keep that in mind. This is worth the money especially if you ride often.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Moore

customer_reviews.title: dirty and greasy
customer_reviews.text: Puts dog on the wrong side of the bike. Dog can still get to other side if she tries hard enough. Not safe at all for either of us. Also arrived used, dirty and greasy. Obviously it had been returned by someone else who said the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: This works miracles!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this!!! It works awesome and my dog is definitely a dog to pull and get distracted. This not only stops him from pulling but he stays focused the entire time. He doesn't like bikes and usually jumps up at them so this was a godsend. I tried with just his collar first but it works a lot better attaching it to the ring on the chest of his harness. He's 90 lbs, so I need as much control as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bike tow leash so I could exercise myself and my dogs. I have tried other bike type leashes and all had some type of short coming. The bike tow leash is perfect and very well thought out for walking dogs. I use to use my ATV to road my dogs to get them in shape for hunting season. Now that I have the bike tow leash I am able to get myself and my dogs in shape. The bike tow leash allows me to use my mountain bike on sidewalks or trails I would recommend this to anyone wanting to spend time with their dogs while getting in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Gun Dog

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product so much. I am able to run my dog twice a day and he gets the exercise he needs in a short period of my time. I have had no issue with him running into me or pulling me over. The leash holds him just far enough away from me that he gets all the exercise he needs as well as I get a little bit on the bike. I have had it for two weeks now and I go on rides twice a day. I look forward to this product working for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Funtime

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach, works just right. Took my dog about 30 seconds to figure it out. Makes riding on a bike with a dog much safer. When I'm not using it, I flex it toward the frame and attach it with a velcro wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Big sally

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the safest apparatus to cycle with a strong dog that likes to pull. Unlike the springer, this attaches at the center hub of the rear wheel, so it does not affect your balance when the dog pulls. The semi-rigid construction is perfectly suited to guide the dog in the right direction, and especially to keep it from running into the bike. This is a very good exercise tool for that high energy dog. Just let it pull you and you have full control with both hands on the handle bars and brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Charliezion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Siberian husky/lab mix
customer_reviews.text: Always have people asking about it and/or doing a double take when riding along with our dog. Perfect for our Siberian husky/lab mix. Cannot go wrong with this, and you have a choice in the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeylvr2

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I could have got for my boxer. My boxer is about 60-70lbs and I can not fully run with him because he’s too fast so with this attachment, it allows to me ride right next to him as he sprints. I’ve had this for one month and the quality of this product is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth the price not to worry about being thrown from the bike. My dog lunges from time to time and I can feel it but that's about it. 5'4" female, dog is a 60+lb German shorthaired pointer. If you're walking the bike though and the dog is attached, the bike can easily be pulled away/toward you. I've got some bruises on my leg from that experience.
customer_reviews.author: ZA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young Alaska Husky
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our young Alaskan Husky. It only took one ride to get him hooked, now he can run to his hearts content! I'm not a big person and our dog could easily drag me around on a regular leash. He's been trained to pull, so quickly felt right at home in a harness with this leash. I was shocked at how little his tugging effected me on the bike. We both have fun when it's time to take him out now - so grateful for this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy way to walk your dog
customer_reviews.text: my dog is a Husky and she likes to run and pull things, and she can do that with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complicated text and picture installation instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Bike tow leash does as video illustrated. Only complaint is installation instructions. I am not a bicycle technician and do not know what drop-out chains or clamps are, nor what a Gary Fisher Frame hole is. Would like to have viewed a clear and upclose video of how to install the bike tow leash. The pictures and text wasn't clear for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Time to exercise
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have a very strong Belgian Malinois and was a little afraid he could pull the bike right out from under me but this tow leash absorbs any pulling and he gets right in line. Excellent, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Great bike leash for your best friend!
customer_reviews.text: It looks kind of funny and I was skeptical at first but it literally took less than one minute to attach it. It's that easy. Few products are exactly as described, this one really is. One day maybe it'll be mass produced with a quick release and be cheaper but for now I don't think you can beat it for any price. It simply works and works great! I love it my dog loves it even the wife loves it. Great bike leash!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a miracle. My 65# shepherd mix is a sprinter, she's not happy unless she's running and this is the only way I've been able to tire her out. She can't cross into the bike and I barely feel any pulling. Of course that means you need to be keeping a close eye if your dog is prone to quick potty stops. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo 55lb GWP loves it. I installed it yesterday and did a couple of little runs. Today we did it again. It felt very safe, she tried a couple of times to go check something out and she was yanked right back to where she was supposed to be. She struggled a bit the first 50 feet, then was on board and pulling me down the alley.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra expense!
customer_reviews.text: I knew when purchasing this that it was more expensive than many other options out there, but knowing that the construction appeared better and more sound than other options I went ahead and purchased it. It is absolutely worth the extra expense. I repeat: worth the extra expense! You get what you pay for and this is a high quality, easy to use, reliable item!
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siberian husky and he loves to run. I cannot keep up with him so I purchased this. It is pricey but it's the only way I can keep up with my husky and as other reviewers have mentioned, the stability is great: it keeps the dog close to your side and if he pulls away the leash will gently bring him back to the bike without harming him.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great tow leash !
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bike tow leash! I take our 20 kg puppy Cane Corso on a jug/run every morning. Was a little awkward at first, but within a few times, she was fine. Even if she get startle by cows or a horse wondering around, the bike is still very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Catpoches

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Exactly as described. My skittish dogs don't mind it, and it allows them to get a lot more exercise in a short amount of time, with relatively little effort on my part. People always ask where we got it when they see us, because they want them for their own dogs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic. Great product and gives my dog the excercisd ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. Great product and gives my dog the excercisd she needs. The owner of the company is also incredibly helpful. I needed an additional part because I wanted my dog on the rights side of the bike and he got it to me ASAP. Just know your dog, they are working hard so watch out that they aren't getting too tired.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 60 lb. Border Collie mix (Rascal) who had gotten overweight by about 15 lbs. over the past couple years. I received the BTL yesterday and it is definitely money well spent. We walked Rascal for 10 minutes so he could do his business, hooked him up to the BTL and he took to it immediately. It is a very well designed, quality product that I hope to get many years of use out of. On a side note, my girlfriend was very concerned that it would be dangerous for Rascal to be tied to a bike, but after seeing him on it she is in love with it and can't wait to ride with him herself.
customer_reviews.author: Masintenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, stable bike leash!
customer_reviews.text: I've now done six rides with my 1yo Rhodesian Ridgeback. Today rode past several people, dogs, rabbits, and squirrels with no issues. It is super stable even with a very strong dog wanting to go check things out. I'm using it with a ruffwear front range harness clipped to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. My dog is a Golden Retriever yellow lab mix weighing about 77 pounds. He runs along side my bike with no problem. He cannot pull me over. When he does stop to relieve himself, I am forced to stop, without falling. You do not have to worry about getting tangled in any leaches or straps or ropes. I will recommend this to my fellow dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Houser

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 55 lb pit
customer_reviews.text: Buy this Lead. Great for my 55 lb pit. She love to pull. I go a mile a day with her. Ive used this product for a month. Keeps the dog away from the bike. Worth the money. ( you have to work hard to get my praise.)
customer_reviews.author: Paul.

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will learn quickly
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool. Your dog learns quickly the first time you put it on. It is really fun! The only down side is that it doesn't fit on a modern mountain bike. The tubes are too thick. Luckily I had an old bike hanging around that I use just for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Working up to it....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually ridden the bike with this tow leash yet, still getting my dog accustomed to walking calmly near the moving wheels. The leash itself is really easy to attach and detach for all of our training "rides" and it keeps the pup at just the right distance from the bike and in "heel" position so I'm hoping once we get going she'll really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Surprising
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to believe the reviews and the product information. I find myself surprisingly pleased. Our dog had a high level of energy but was not taking to a bike ride with just a leash. The Bike Tow has really helped even when she's at her highest level she has not been able to pull the bike off course and is suitable tired at the end of our ride.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Harding

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!!!! I have a German shepherd and a cattle dog and we cycle with them all the time. This piece is well made and constructed. Not cheap. It will definitely stand the test of time and lots of use. I'm glad we invested in a better piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie S.

product_meta.title: Best Dog Bike Leash - Bike Tow Leash
product_meta.description: Color:YellowRide safely with your dog(s) with the Bike Tow Leash with standard clamp for bikes, trikes with one rear wheel & mobility scooters! Amazingly fun and stable, the Bike Tow Leash prevents tipping and tangling making biking with your dog enjoyably stress free and rewarding. The Bike Tow Leash automatically reacts to the dogs movements as you would with an extra arm mounted low on your bike. It has a shoulder, elbow and wrist resilient barrier between your dog and bike to protect and gently communicate bike direction and speed changes. The Bike Tow Leash's unique patented mast prevents the bike from tipping when the dog pulls, reduces any jolts and gently trains your dog to stay in heel position. No special training is needed and is for dogs 10 to 185 pounds. The Bike Tow Leash comes with use and instructions and mounts without tools in less than 1 minute. When choosing color, for safety, we recommend a contrast between Bike Tow Leash color and bike so people can see your dog(s) are attached to your bike. Fits most bikes on left side and we recommend wide tire bikes with or without disc brakes. Attaches directly to trikes with a single rear wheel and mobility scooters. Contains standard length Bike Tow Leash, Standard Mounting Clamp, installation instructions and is a unique conversation starter with many years of enjoyment!
feature_bullets: American Pet Association 5 star safety approved for safely riding with your dog
For energetic dogs weighing from 10 to 185 pounds
Prevents tipping, tangling and steering sideways through unique design that takes in to account the laws of physics
Fits on left side of most bikes, trikes and mobility scooters
Made in the USA with Solar Power
